/ experience

  1. Data Scrubber @Retirent - 2021-Present

    At Retirent, I serve as a data scrubber, ensuring the accuracy and reliability of the company's real estate databases. I meticulously review and clean large datasets, collaborate with other departments to customize processes, and contribute to the development of data governance policies. My role plays a key part in maintaining data integrity and optimizing workflow efficiency.
